author: PTI
title: Kathy Griffin admitted to Covid isolation ward
description: Kathy Griffin admitted to Covid isolation wardThe comedian-actor posted a selfie on Instagram from the hospital room.
content: LOS ANGELES: Veteran actor-comedian Kathy Griffin has revealed that she has been admitted to an "isolation ward room" after she showed symptoms for the novel coronavirus. The 59-year-old posted a selfie on Instagram from the hospital room as she called out US… [+3247 chars]
